name: Loop Dun(geons) Dare
description:
This game created for join the Ludum Dare Oct 2020 & practice purpose 
Topic : 2D, Follow AI, Shooting Machanic, Pixle art,TextMeshPro

Team Type : Solo
Total Time Made (estimate) : 0 day 21+ hr  
------------------ About Game  ------------------
Just kill enemy and get lv Up!(Damage,Cri chance,Cri damage)
Also if you get kill..... 
Don't worry!! you will Reborn like the enemy

P.S. So sad that i notice this event too late so i don't have much time :( 

------------------ How To Play ------------------

WASD : Move
Space: Jump
Move Mouse : Aim
Left Click : shoot mini bullet
Right Click : shoot Laser bullet

Thank you for testing my prototype!

-SunraymanZ-
